import React from "react"; import ProgressBar from '../../components/ProgressBar'; import data from '../../assets/home/icons/Tours/date.svg'; import time from '../../assets/home/icons/Tours/time.svg'; import Tuscany from '../../DB/Tuscany.json'; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; export default function BookingDetails () { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const selectedTime = useDispatch((state)=> state.datepicker.setTime); const selectedDate = useDispatch((state)=> state.datepicker.setDate); const adultPrice = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.adultPrice); const childPrice = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.childPrice); const infantPrice = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.infantPrice); const adultCost = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.adultCost ); const childCost = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.childCost); const infantCost = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.infantCost); const setDescrease = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.decrease); const setIncrease = useDispatch((state)=> state.tour.increase); const setValue = useDispatch() return(
{/* */}

setValue(e.target.value)} />
